content: Un sogno... stavo cercando di spiegare a San Pietro, e lo stavo facendo in lingua tedesca perch√© non volevo essere troppo esplicito.
translations: eng:A dream... I was trying to explain to St. Peter, and was doing it in the German tongue, because I didn't want to be too
